mapper.sql: id, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, orderNumber, userId, status, addressId, price, payMethod, freight
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( SUM(CASE p.isPromotion WHEN 1 THEN p.promotionPrice ELSE p.price END * tp.number),0) AS price FROM t_order_product tp, t_product p WHERE tp.orderId = #{orderId} AND tp.productId = p.id

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.orderNumber, o.`status`, o.price, o.freight, o.create_time AS createTime, CASE o.payMethod WHEN 0 THEN '支付宝支付' WHEN 1 THEN '微信支付' WHEN 2 THEN '欢喜券支付' WHEN 3 THEN '线下支付' ELSE '无' END AS payMethod, CONCAT(cc.mergerName,ta.detailAddress) AS `address`, ta.contacts AS consignee, ta.phone AS phone FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_address ta ON o.addressId = ta.id LEFT JOIN citys cc ON cc.id = ta.cityId WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
